item.text: The character is trained how to drive in unusual circumstances, such as inclement weather, or during a dramatic situation, such as being chased, or attempting to reach a location quickly. A character does not need any ranks in drive in order to drive a civilian car, truck, or motorcycle. When driving, the character can attempt simple maneuvers or stunts.
A character can take 10 when driving.

There is no penalty for operating a general-purpose motor vehicle. Other types of motor vehicles (heavy wheeled, powerboat, sailboat, ship, and tracked) require the corresponding Surface Vehicle Operation feat, or the character takes a âˆ’4 penalty on Drive checks.
Most driving checks have consequences for failure that make trying again impossible.
